mapper.select: select pt.product_no , pt.product_name , pt.product_price , s.shop_name from product pt, shops s where pt.shop_id = s.shop_id
select pt.product_no , pt.product_name , min(pt.product_price) product_price from product pt where pt.product_no = #{product_no} group by pt.product_no, pt.product_name

select pp.product_no , ss.shop_name , ss.shop_id , pp.product_price product_price , pp.product_image_url product_image_url , pp.product_link_url product_link_url from product pp left join shops ss on pp.shop_id = ss.shop_id where pp.product_no = #{product_no}
